title: Rainy city driving, almost stopped at intersection
caption: A white van drives through a rainy city intersection.

description: The white van is driving slowly through a busy city intersection. There are several other cars on the road, including a red car and a black car. The road is wet from the rain, and there are traffic lights and street signs visible. The weather is overcast and the visibility is moderate.
reasoning: The white van is driving slowly through the intersection because of the rainy weather conditions. The driver is being cautious and following the traffic rules. The van is maintaining a safe distance from the other cars on the road and is prepared to stop if necessary. The driver is paying attention to the traffic lights and street signs to ensure safe navigation through the intersection.
